name: Hentai Strike 1.6
description:
Anime girls are furious, they do not like other girls, from another building. Okay, take the cards in your hands and destroy your enemies ahead!
You will have 6 different cards, with which you can achieve different combinations.
And it is you who will be able to prove to everyone their skills in the game and defeat a very strong AI.

Also, you will have the opportunity to create your own decks to select the best cards that you will play with.

How To Play
- Each player will have their own "base" which they must defend. A 'base' will have a starting health of 25.
- There are different zones for each type of cards, so creature cards can only be deployed in Battle Zone while spell cards are only in Spell zone.
- Some creature cards can only attack cards, some can only attack the base, and there are those that can attack both.
- Spell cards can affect creature cards as well as bases. They are activated automatically once deployed.
